Questions.Question: Who played the role of Freddie Mercury in the biopic 'Bohemian Rhapsody'?
Questions.Explanation: Rami Malek portrayed the iconic singer Freddie Mercury in the biopic 'Bohemian Rhapsody' released in 2018.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'Ray'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'Ray' tells the story of the legendary musician Ray Charles and his rise to fame.

Questions.Question: Who directed the biopic 'Walk the Line' about Johnny Cash?
Questions.Explanation: James Mangold directed the biopic 'Walk the Line' which chronicles the life of Johnny Cash.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrayed Jim Morrison in the biopic 'The Doors'?
Questions.Explanation: Val Kilmer played the role of Jim Morrison, the lead singer of The Doors, in the biopic 'The Doors'.

Questions.Question: Who played the role of Elton John in the biopic 'Rocketman'?
Questions.Explanation: Taron Egerton portrayed the legendary musician Elton John in the biopic 'Rocketman' released in 2019.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'I'm Not There'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'I'm Not There' explores different aspects of Bob Dylan's life through multiple actors.

Questions.Question: Who directed the biopic 'Amadeus' about Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart?
Questions.Explanation: Milos Forman directed the biopic 'Amadeus' which delves into the life of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'Straight Outta Compton'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'Straight Outta Compton' tells the story of the influential rap group N.W.A.

Questions.Question: Who played the role of Johnny Cash in the biopic 'Walk the Line'?
Questions.Explanation: Joaquin Phoenix portrayed the legendary musician Johnny Cash in the biopic 'Walk the Line'.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'La Bamba'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'La Bamba' tells the story of the talented musician Ritchie Valens and his tragically short career.

Questions.Question: Who directed the biopic 'Control' about Ian Curtis of Joy Division?
Questions.Explanation: Anton Corbijn directed the biopic 'Control' which explores the life of Ian Curtis, the lead singer of Joy Division.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'What's Love Got to Do with It'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'What's Love Got to Do with It' portrays the life of the legendary singer Tina Turner.

Questions.Question: Who played the role of Jimi Hendrix in the biopic 'Jimi: All Is by My Side'?
Questions.Explanation: André Benjamin, also known as André 3000, portrayed Jimi Hendrix in the biopic 'Jimi: All Is by My Side'.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'Coal Miner's Daughter'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'Coal Miner's Daughter' tells the story of country music legend Loretta Lynn.

Questions.Question: Who directed the biopic 'Sid and Nancy' about Sid Vicious of the Sex Pistols?
Questions.Explanation: Alex Cox directed the biopic 'Sid and Nancy' which explores the tumultuous relationship of Sid Vicious and Nancy Spungen.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'Get On Up'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'Get On Up' portrays the life of the Godfather of Soul, James Brown.

Questions.Question: Who played the role of Ian Curtis in the biopic 'Control'?
Questions.Explanation: Sam Riley portrayed Ian Curtis, the lead singer of Joy Division, in the biopic 'Control'.

Questions.Question: Which musician's life is depicted in the biopic 'The Runaways'?
Questions.Explanation: The biopic 'The Runaways' tells the story of the all-female rock band led by Joan Jett.

Questions.Question: Who directed the biopic 'I'm Not There' about Bob Dylan?
Questions.Explanation: Todd Haynes directed the biopic 'I'm Not There' which explores different aspects of Bob Dylan's life.
